message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I believe it would be incredibly valuable for you. I'm asking for $18,000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?

I appreciate your offer, Bob, but $10,000 is significantly below its true value.  How about we meet halfway between our previous offers at $14,000? This reflects the value this product will bring you.
I understand the product has value, but $14,000 is still a bit steep for me. How about we meet at $12,000? I'm willing to pay a premium, but I need to stay within my budget.
